channel.title: Zangetsu My First Model
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my first model. I'm big Bleach fan. I'll be working on other items. At least I'll try.
So here are pics:
Wield 3D Model: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2lmqoag.jpg[/img]
Drop 3D Model: [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/awb5ds.jpg[/img]
In Game:
Wield: [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/29ymjrd.png[/img]
Drop: [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/v2w6xk.png[/img] ________________________________________________________________________________________________
Download Link (.dat): http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jomzznnnwtu
Download Link (.mqo): http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mm2zzejetml ________________________________________________________________________________________________
Please rate and comment :D ________________________________________________________________________________________________
I've been asked how to make it a 2h. So I'll put it here. CONTACT ME ONLY IF YOU HAVE SOME PROBLEMS WITH THAT!!! Now here will i copy my quote:
i went to client.java and i look for: [code] if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170) // 2h[/code] . 7170 is mud pie, but in my server its zangetsu. animation is 2065. so dont touch that. just copy it and paste it under that code and edit item ids for 2h emote. hope i explained it right...and heres full code : [code]if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170) // 2h { return 2065; }[/code]. now ill try to explain it only on that code!. [code]if[/code] says: if(item id) then do...
[code](id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170)[/code] that r ids of items what will be "wielding" as a 2h (7170 is zangetsu, idk others but probably some 2h)
[code]// 2h[/code] is only a comment...that helps a lot
[code]{[/code] is end of ids and then that "commands" what to do if one of that items is wielding
[code]return 2065;[/code] this is what { commands. it says: if ids r...then do that emote! 2065 is emote for a 2h wielding
[code]}[/code] says: end of that command! do that emote for only that items!
hope that helped :P...if u dont understand it well, then contact me on msn ( zeka_os@hotmail.com )

item.title: Zangetsu My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CroBunny CroBunny
item.description:
@CroBunny wrote:

lukenuke75:

how did you make it hold that item like a 2h sword??? mine is always held like aw sword…

if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170) // 2h[/code] . 7170 is mud pie, but in my server its zangetsu. animation is 2065. so dont touch that. just copy it and paste it under that code and edit item ids for 2h emote. hope i explained it right…and heres full code : if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170) // 2h { return 2065; }. now ill try to explain it only on that code!.

if

says: if(item id) then do…

(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6528 || id == 7170)

that r ids of items what will be “wielding” as a 2h (7170 is zangetsu, idk others but probably some 2h)

// 2h

is only a comment…that helps a lot

{

is end of ids and then that “commands” what to do if one of that items is wielding

return 2065;

this is what { commands. it says: if ids r…then do that emote! 2065 is emote for a 2h wielding

}

says: end of that command! do that emote for only that items!

hope that helped :P… thats what a 13 yr old boy can do…if u dont understand it well, then contact me on msn ( zeka_os@hotmail.com )

Read full topic
